channel.title: Multi combat?
channel.description: how can i make all npc multi attackable??? [pi] server

item.title: Multi combat?
item.dc:creator: @monsters monsters
item.description:
@monsters wrote:

in player.java search

Something like this should show up.

public boolean inMulti() { if((absX >= 3136 && absX <= 3327 && absY >= 3519 && absY <= 3607) || (absX >= 3210 && absX <= 3339 && absY >= 9333 && absY <= 9424) || (heightLevel == 0 && absX <= 2950 && absX >= 2810 && absY >= 5250 && absY <= 5370) || (heightLevel == 1 && absX <= 2950 && absX >= 2810 && absY >= 5250 && absY <= 5370) || (heightLevel == 2 && absX <= 2950 && absX >= 2810 && absY >= 5250 && absY <= 5370) || (absX >= 2607 && absX <= 2644 && absY >= 3296 && absY <= 3332) || (absX >= 2949 && absX <= 3001 && absY >= 3370 && absY <= 3392) || (absX >= 2338 && absX <= 2392 && absY >= 4936 && absY <= 4987) || (absX >= 3250 && absX <= 3342 && absY >= 9800 && absY <= 9870) || (absX >= 3190 && absX <= 3327 && absY >= 3648 && absY <= 3839) || (absX >= 3200 && absX <= 3390 && absY >= 3840 && absY <= 3967) || (absX >= 2992 && absX <= 3007 && absY >= 3912 && absY <= 3967) || (absX >= 2946 && absX <= 2959 && absY >= 3816 && absY <= 3831) || (absX >= 3008 && absX <= 3199 && absY >= 3856 && absY <= 3903) || (absX >= 3008 && absX <= 3071 && absY >= 3600 && absY <= 3711) || (absX >= 3072 && absX <= 3327 && absY >= 3608 && absY <= 3647) || (absX >= 2624 && absX <= 2690 && absY >= 2550 && absY <= 2619) || (absX >= 2371 && absX <= 2422 && absY >= 5062 && absY <= 5117) || (absX >= 2896 && absX <= 2927 && absY >= 3595 && absY <= 3630) || (absX >= 2892 && absX <= 2932 && absY >= 4435 && absY <= 4464) || (absX >= 2256 && absX <= 2287 && absY >= 4680 && absY <= 4711) || (absX >= 3277 && absX <= 3303 && absY >= 3015 && absY <= 3030) || (absX >= 3029 && absX <= 3068 && absY >= 9560 && absY <= 9600)) { return true; } return false; }

just copy and paste
(absX >= corner1X && absX <= Corner2X && absY >= Corner1Y && absY <= Corner2Y) ||
